评论概述: Cheap, Cheap quality - don't waste your money
评论详情: Right out of the bag, the clasp did not align so they were useless.  You get what you pay for. These are extremely cheap quality.

You get what you pay for with cheap jewelry. The metal is pretty soft so it bends easily. One of the earrings is unusable because when I tried to adjust it to close, it bent too far and now doesn't loop properly so it doesn't close anymore.

I wasn’t sure about these earrings from the photos, but I was extremely pleased with them upon their arrival. These are a teensy bit weightier than other huggies. I’ve ordered lately, but not so much that they’re uncomfortable. They are a comfortable size and seem to be made well. I have slept in them without noticing they were there. I haven’t noticed any issues with irritation. The closure works well. They were affordable and pair well with other earrings I have. They are edgy and classy, just how I like ‘em!
These are so cute but not worth it I've bought two pairs because the earring closure came loose and they fell out of my ear very bad quality

I've been living in these for weeks, showering, sleeping, exercising and they haven't once come off or even loose. Makes me feel more like myself than the basic small hoops I was wearing before. Only thing that bugs me a bit is one side matches up and closes effortlessly, the other side I need to lign up a little to close it.
Smaller than I expected but I still like them very much.
I like the earrings my only complain is that one of the closing clips is looser than the other
real silver, doesn’t cause an allergic reaction. easy to snap closed.
these earrings are really cute but the stems you put through your piercing holes are a little on the thick side! I still wear them quite often but they occasionally take a bit of time to put on
Weak clasp and so light weight I didn't notice it fall out and get lost on first wear.
I wear these for weeks at a time with no issues. They don’t make my ears sore, haven’t tarnished or changed color. Very cute!
They fit are spikey and poke. Just as they should.
Very nice earrings fit perfectly was as described  thank you so very much Keith 😊
I was worried about these, but they are cute, punky, and easy to use.
I got these to match my spiky septum piercing and they all compliment eachother really well. I love it!
